<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Copy of HTML">adab8856db6e1c10b80d5843f39619ce</child><cloned>2020-08-12 14:23:49</cloned><last_validated>2020-08-12 14:23:49</last_validated><parent display_value="HTML">8679ef89cb21120000f8d856634c9c4f</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>standard</category><client_script><![CDATA[function ($scope, $sce) {
	var c = this;
	c.html = $sce.trustAsHtml(c.options.html);
	$scope.$watch('c.options.html',function(){
		c.html = $sce.trustAsHtml(c.options.html);
	})
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css/><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data>{"options": &#13;
	{&#13;
		"html": "&lt;i&gt;Hi&lt;/i&gt;",&#13;
		"title": "HTML"&#13;
	}&#13;
}</demo_data><description/><docs/><field_list>title</field_list><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link/><name>HTML</name><option_schema>[{"name":"html","default_value":" &lt;b&gt;hello&lt;/b&gt;","section":"Data","label":"HTML","type":"translated_html"}]</option_schema><public>true</public><roles/><script/><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-02-11 22:48:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>8679ef89cb21120000f8d856634c9c4f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HTML</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">80af5c38dbb0130065799c18db9619be</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_8679ef89cb21120000f8d856634c9c4f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-24 20:44:47</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div>
  <div ng-if="!c.options.html" class="panel panel-default">
    <div class="panel-body">
      <b>${HTML Widget}</b><br>
      ${Ctrl + Click > Options to set HTML content}
    </div>
  </div>
  <div ng-if="c.options.html" ng-bind-html="c.html"></div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hunan</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-12 14:23:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>e9ab8856db6e1c10b80d5843f39619d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>adab8856db6e1c10b80d5843f39619ce</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Coach Incident  optimization" source="x_achin_coach_inci">2b20d4e8db87f3404f229a64db96199d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coach Incident  optimization">2b20d4e8db87f3404f229a64db96199d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_e9ab8856db6e1c10b80d5843f39619d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hunan</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-12 14:23:49</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
